scripts.dev: npm run build && babel --watch --ignore node_modules --out-dir build . && nodemon build/server.js
scripts.build: rm -rf build && babel --ignore node_modules --out-dir build . && cp -f package.json build/
scripts.test: npm run build && lab -S -C -a code build/tests
scripts.coverage: npm run build && lab -S -C -a code -r html -o coverage.html build/tests
